title: 11. COL Michael McLendon - Green Beret leader and mentor
description:
What does it feel like when you are in a room and no one looks like you? Is the leader-follower relationship in an organization the singular most significant relationship to developing the organization’s culture? Join Green Beret COL Michael McLendon as he discusses the importance of mentorship both as a mentee and a mentor. McLendon emphasizes a diverse force will motivate the best and brightest from across the country to take the challenge and succeed in joining SOF.

The 25-year Army veteran talks about the need for establishing partnerships at home and abroad synchronizing readiness in the battlespace. He stresses being a positive ambassador for SOF is essential developing these relationships. We know you’ll enjoy hearing his perspectives on leadership, diversity and strengthening partnerships.
